definition: to wear mourning clothes/to be in mourning/also written 披麻帶孝|披麻带孝
to attend a funeral/to take part in a funeral procession
to get through the mourning period
a gift of money to the family of the deceased
to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
to keep watch beside a coffin
to hasten home for the funeral of a parent or grandparent
